import React from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/log.jpg' import cart_logo from '../Assets/cart.jpg' const Navbar = () => { const[menu,setMenu]=useState("all"); return (

Shoppers' Stop

  • {setMenu("all")}}>All{menu==="all"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("men")}}>Men{menu==="men"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("women")}}>Women{menu==="women"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
0
) } export default Navbar
